name: Sound Forge Pro Audio Peak File

common_filenames.description: [same_name_as_the_WAV_file].sfk - MAGIX Sound Forge Pro or VEGAS Pro name SFK files with the same name as the WAV file. For example, an audio.wav is accompanied by an audio.sfk file.
[same_name_as_the_WAV_file].sfk - MAGIX Sound Forge Pro or VEGAS Pro name SFK files with the same name as the WAV file. For example, an audio.wav is accompanied by an audio.sfk file.
